meaningMnemonic:
When someone applies <kanji>finger</kanji> <kanji>pressure</kanji>, they're probably practicing <vocabulary>shiatsu</vocabulary>.

Shiatsu is an alternative therapy from Japan, which involves applying pressure with the fingertips to specific spots on the body. This word can also refer to any kind of <vocabulary>finger pressure</vocabulary>, logically enough!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
